REWARD_TEXT:
You have only one exchange opportunity.
Only the distributor can press the exchange button, and if pressed in advance, the exchange will be impossible.
Would you like to exchange Concoin and Gangnaengyi now?
REWARD_DENIED: You must complete all the games to receive the reward.
TUTORIAL_01_01_02_TALK: We're trying to grow corn at the museum, but we're short of hands.
TUTORIAL_01_POPUP_TITLE: Would you like to help labB start the corn farm?
TUTORIAL_01_02_TALK: Great! Let me tell you what needs to be done.
By completing each task, you can become a farmer.
TUTORIAL_01_04_TALK: Now, let's take a seat and start farming.
GAME_01_01: Till the field and remove the stones.
GAME_01_02: Pouring water using the watering can.
GAME_01_03: Plant corn seeds in the soil.
GAME_01_WARNING_02: You've run out of energy! Rest is essential.
GAME_01_ALMOST_COMPLETE: You're almost there. Hang in there!
GAME_01_POPUP_WATERMELON: A cool, sweet watermelon restores your energy.
GAME_01_POPUP_AMERICANO: A cold Americano relieves your fatigue.
GAME_01_POPUP_REST: Take a moment to gaze at the surrounding scenery and rest.
GAME_01_POPUP_SUCCESS: Success! You've cultivated a viable field!
TUTORIAL_02_01_TALK: Even in the digital world, 'labor' exists.
While engrossed in the game, you might forget you're working.
TUTORIAL_02_02_TALK: Now, it's time to wait for the corn to grow.
During this waiting period, the tedious and exhausting care working continues.
TUTORIAL_02_03_TALK: But don't worry. Game time passes faster than real life.
Here are your tasks while the corn grows.
TUTORIAL_02_05_TALK: For 100 seconds, be a scarecrow and protect the corn.
GAME_02_FAIL_01: Corn farming failed! Weeds took away the nutrients.
GAME_02_FAIL_02: Corn farming failed! Please get rid of the bugs in time.
GAME_02_FAIL_03: Corn farming failed! Animals damaged the cornfield.
GAME_02_POPUP_POISON: Should we spray herbicide? It prevents weed growth.
GAME_02_POPUP_WORM: The earthworm has lost its habitat.
GAME_02_POPUP_BUGKILLER: Should we spray pesticide? It prevents pest diseases.
GAME_02_POPUP_BEE: The number of honeybees has decreased.
TUTORIAL_03_01_TALK: Look at our deliciously grown corn.
In the barren urban landscape, it's tough to find farmland.
But here, with just a click, you can relish the joy of mining and harvesting.
TUTORIAL_03_02_TALK: Now, it's time to showcase your corn on social media.
By posting writings and pictures, downloading files, the digital economy gets a boost.
Our focus, time, information, and data, as a new form of currency,
have the value worth exchanging for a bag of Gangnaengyi
The corn selfie is a modern performance proving your labor!
Now, announce your identity as a digital farmer of this era.
TUTORIAL_03_POPUP_TITLE: Press the camera button and earn Corn Coins.
GAME_03_LOADING: Please wait until corn glasses and a beard appear...
GAME_03_COIN_TRANSFERING: Converting corn face data to Corn Coins.
